text.name: homepage_header_font_style
text.name_friendly: Homepage Hero Text Font Style (separate multiple value with a comma)

yes_no.name: field_type_toggle
yes_no.name_friendly: Field Type (text: 150 character limit; textarea: unlimited)

dataset.name: footer_links
dataset.name_friendly: Footer Links e.g. Terms of Use

text.name: timeline_title

dropdown.name: horizontal_alignment_for_mobile

item.bubble_blurb: We support local farms to get the freshest ingredients for our customers.
Only the healthiest meals for your family.
Come and visit us! We can't wait to see you.

item.general_info_one: For general information, questions, appointment requests, call us at:

item.promo_description: Get a beautiful bouquet for your loved one 25% off all week!

item.body_text: Please find most of our patient forms below.
item.download_form_note: Please see a list of our most common forms below. Once you find the form that you need, click the PDF icon to download.

item.body_text:
We offer our clients a variety of payment options, including CareCredit and some pet health insurance plans. Please see a full list of all available options below.

  • VISA
  • MasterCard
  • American Express
  • Discover
  • Cash or Check

 

We also accept CareCredit. Learn more about CareCredit.
